channel.title: mangOH Boards Continued support
channel.description: I noticed a lot of the distributors are running low on mangOH Boards and say that they aren't planning to restock. Is there a replacement platform / is this going to be discontinued?

item.title: mangOH Boards Continued support
item.dc:creator: dpinc
item.description:
I would also like information on mangOh board support. The mangOh yellow is no longer getting firmware updates to support the Octave platform.

Read full topic
